name: Stumpy's first adventure
description:
A short RPG in a box for no apparent reason.

Starring Stumpy The tree squirrel!

I was inspired to make this game while watching Rpg in a box's zesty and informative tutorial videos. 

There is a lot of lore in this game.

Don't drink the mysterious potion...

fixes  and mac versions are forth coming

Can you find the Mysterious potion?

•Features•

A basic skills feature:

you can select the inventory page and cast spells such as Mend and Regenerate

Spells:

Regenerate: Restores a small amount of HP for 9 seconds.

Mend I : Restores 5 HP.

Mend II: restores 10 HP.

Mend III : Restores 100 HP.

Squirrel's Wit

Raises defense by 2.

There will be some issues with the game, I am aware of this  and I will try to fix them as best as possible.
